A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The sole goal of this movie\, was to not be a Star Wars movie\, and they fully succeeded.  There is no continuity with the rest of the franchise\, and they just make up new force powers and physics to make it fit a mindless and PC plot.  While it is OK to watch the first time\, as soon as you put any thought into the \"why\" that anyone did anything in this movie\, it completely falls apart.  On the plus side\, it makes Episode 3 look awesome\, in comparison....
